channel.title: PrestaShop 1.6 plugin on MultiSafepay Docs
channel.description: Recent content in PrestaShop 1.6 plugin on MultiSafepay Docs

item.title: PrestaShop plugin changelog
item.description: 3.7.1 Release date: Jan 7th, 2022 Changed PLGPRSS-423: Rename Client class to MultiSafepayClient to avoid conflict with third party modules 3.7.0 Release date: Nov 25th, 2021 Added DAVAMS-232: Add support for in3 payment method PLGPRSS-420: Add payment component support for Credit Card payment method PLGPRSS-409: Add support for gift products within the Shopping Cart object PLGPRSS-406: Add support for Good4fun gift card Fixed PLGPRSS-414: Fix locale code when submit the Order Request, which was generating errors in case payment address code of the customer is different from the language selected Changed PLGPRSS-408: When a payment is cancelled, the shopping cart will not be emptied DAVAMS-314: Rebrand Klarna with new logo DAVAMS-298: Rebrand Direct Bank Transfer as Request to Pay 3.
